name: Fidelis, Inc.
tagline: Our IT support is your peace of mind
description:
Fidelis supports our clients with communications technologies that help run their business. We provide solutions to IT needs from assessments to complete network analysis.
We offer managed services for all or part of a business'​ IT infrastructure including:
Network Management
Desktop Management
Server Management
Security Management
Data Back-Up and Business Continuity
Help Desk Support
Cloud Services
VoIP Phone Systems (on premise, hosted or virtualized)
We believe in a proactive approach to maintenance and we offer our clients several plans tailored to their needs. Our goal is to prevent down time, create more efficiency on our clients'​ networks, and save them money.
Additionally, we have a dedicated low voltage team that focuses on cabling for voice and data infrastructure.
Fidelis is Latin for "faithful"​ and "Loyal"​ which reflects our core value of maintaining integrity and doing what we say we will do.
